title: uidiDumAru enakku
sahitya:
uidiDumAru enakku udaviDa vArumaiyE vaiyApuri uraiyum vaDivEl murugaiyE


anupallavi

  kaigaL IrArum aruLaik-kUsiDAdu vAri vIsum koDaiyOnAip-pugazh aDaindu tigazhvOnE


caraNam    paDi mIdun bhaktarai iDarEdum toDarAdu taDittiDum urutuNai koDuttaruL purivOnE
kaDaittEri viDum varai aDiyEnaip-parivODu kAttiDak-kOri unnai tOttarittiDuvEnE
